attributes.action: Shut down shell companies, sanction the banks.
attributes.background: Tax Havens are a fundamental corruption of our taxation system, and an embarrassment to the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government to take. 

We already have a petition calling on action on tax havens, which you may want to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/126615

Or you may want to start a new petition calling clearly for the specific action you want to see.
